name: Tornado Mayhem
description:
Control the Tornado (using WASD or Arrows) to destroy what you can in 30 seconds!

Entry for the 48h Kenney Jam 2021

Credits:

  • GuilhermeHQ: Game, Level, Sound Design
  • Caio1: Programing and ALL problem solving
  • All assets (except audio) from https://www.kenney.nl/
